name: The Only Kettlebell Workout You Need
description: A full-body kettlebell circuit designed for overall fitness. Single kettlebell, 30-40 minutes, repeatable multiple times per week with easy progression. @Asgooch's go-to recommendation for general fitness.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: Explosive hip hinge to swing the kettlebell between the legs and up to chest height using momentum from the hips.
exercises.notes: Keep back straight, drive with hips, controlled descent.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Clean to Squat
exercises.description: Clean the kettlebell to rack position then perform a front squat, returning to standing.
exercises.notes: Explode from hips for clean, maintain upright torso in squat.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Chest Press
exercises.description: Lie on back, press kettlebell from chest to overhead extension.
exercises.notes: 4 sets; keep elbows at 45 degrees, controlled press.

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Up
exercises.description: From lying position with kettlebell overhead, stand up while keeping arm extended, then reverse to ground.
exercises.notes: 3 each side; focus on stability and control. This is the skill work portion.

circuit.notes: Cycle through exercises with minimal rest. Progress by increasing weight or reps. Hit this multiple times per week.

raw.transcript: No spoken audio; background music only.
raw.caption: If you're just looking to get in great shape, this is a solid workout to hit multiple times a week. You only need a single kettlebell, about 30-40 minutes, and you can progress is easily.
raw.visualSummary: Short video montage demonstrating kettlebell swings, clean to squat, lying chest presses, and Turkish get-ups in various settings.

uncertainties: Swing reps not explicitly shown — defaulted to 20
Turkish Get-Up shown as 3x12 but that's unusually high — interpreted as 3 each side per round
No audio — video is a teaser montage
